subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: After the move, the lab’s director, Grigory Rodchenkov, was said to have resigned, all in the wake of the report, which outlined systemic doping in Russian athletics.
snippet: After the move, the lab’s director, Grigory Rodchenkov, was said to have resigned, all in the wake of the report, which outlined systemic doping in Russian athletics.
